articles.title: Arm Taps Amazon AI Veteran To Drive In-House Chip Push, Challenge Nvidia And AMD: Report
articles.summary: In a strategic move, Arm Holdings has recruited Rami Sinno, a former Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ: AMZN) artificial intelligence (AI) chip director, to enhance its in-house chip development plans.
articles.translated_title: Arm Taps Amazon AI Veteran To Drive In-House Chip Push, Challenge Nvidia And AMD: Report

articles.title: SoftBank's growing bets on AI and semiconductor assets
articles.summary: SoftBank announced on Tuesday a $2 billion investment in Intel that will add to the Japanese tech investor's ambitious bet on artificial intelligence and the chip industry.
articles.translated_title: SoftBank's growing bets on AI and semiconductor assets
articles.translated_summary: SoftBank announced on Tuesday a $2 billion investment in Intel that will add to the Japanese tech investor's ambitious bet on artificial intelligence and the chip industry.

articles.title: Meta's Billion-Dollar AI 'Super Team' Could End Up Like The Metaverse, Warns Venture Capitalist: 'Don't Think Anyone's The '96 Bulls'
articles.summary: Venture capitalist Sarah Kunst of Cleo Capital is raising concerns regarding Meta Platforms Inc.'s (NASDAQ: META) latest reorganization and its high-priced push into artificial intelligence, warning that the strategy could mirror the company's failed metaverse experiment.
articles.translated_title: Meta's Billion-Dollar AI 'Super Team' Could End Up Like The Metaverse, Warns Venture Capitalist: 'Don't Think Anyone's The '96 Bulls'

articles.title: Salesforce Bets Big On 'Agentic AI,' Acquires Regrello To End Manual Work, Enable AI-Powered Automations
articles.summary: Salesforce Inc. signed a definitive agreement to acquire Regrello, an artificial intelligence-native automation platform.

articles.title: How AI data centers lead to big electric bills in NY and NJ
articles.summary: Households are now competing against power-hungry computer data centers from the likes of Amazon, Google, Meta and Microsoft put strain on the grid to power new artificial intelligence projects. Add in the fact that New York and New Jersey have both shut down nuclear power and pursued expensive green mandates, and customers are seeing a big strain on their wallets.
